Scattershot:

Scattershot stepped out of the CR chamber, fully healed and re-energized.  He 
gasped.  "W...what?  There were only five CR chambers when I got in...now 
six..." he sighed.  "I'm losing it.  Wait, I'm already psychotic!" he laughed 
wildly.  Going to the bridge.  He saw on the scanners and unidentified craft 
plunging, then hit the ground.  <Zardus, this is Scattershot, a craft has 
crashed on the planet.  Shall I invesitigate?>
